publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3619 Mary Scanlon: The National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009 (SSI 2009/37).

S3M-3619 Mary Scanlon: The National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the National Health Service (Charges for Drugs and Appliances) (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2009 (SSI 2009/37).
